Package com.cafean.client.values

Class UnitDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.values.UnitDescriptor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumericsUnitDescriptor
    public abstract class UnitDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a replacement for several of the CReal handling methods in AbstractNumericsModel that take Class references as an argument. The original methods were designed with the assumption that each different unit would be represented by a distinct CReal implementation. Contemporary usage is at odds with this assumption, as seen in GlobalCReal in Job Stream, which represents several unit types maintained in an external list.

    These methods resolve around the labels returned by getUnitNames. The implementation must handle these labels consistently across application sessions, as the unit names may be saved or exported.

    For all methods that take a unit name, any cases where the unit name is null, empty, or white-space: the unit name should be treated as if the result of getDimensionlessName() was passed.
